column4: Does anyone know about a bug with the system monitor and CPU ?
what kind of bug?
hmm.. and there's nothing in the process list? an old firefox process running amok or something like that?
make sure you click the view menu.. and select "All"
for some reason i can't access my app places or system files its like they are frozen neither are my open windows showing on the bottom bar
do you have a terminal open?
and there is 5 python processes
using lots of processor power?
no
anything using more than a couple percent of the cpu?
you can sort by processor usage
the gnome panel is toping at 50%
hmm.. gnome-panel doesn't usually do that.. try killing it
but how come the second is flatlining at 100%
well.. if gnome-panel is using 50% of your available processor power.. it is using one whole core out of two, right?
it worked
and YES
did gnome-panel restart automatically?
i stoped it and the cpu usage droped
it shouldn't really be necessary.. gnome panel should behave
without being put in a leach
